description: Manage timer triggers for a task.

commands.name: az acr task timer add
commands.summary: Add a timer trigger to a task.
commands.syntax:
az acr task timer add --name
                      --registry
                      --schedule
                      --timer-name
                      [--enabled {false, true}]
                      [--resource-group]
examples: az acr task timer add -n taskname -r registryname --timer-name t2 --schedule "30 9 * * 1-5"

commands.name: az acr task timer list
commands.summary: List all timer triggers for a task.
examples: az acr task timer list -n taskname -r registryname

commands.name: az acr task timer remove
commands.summary: Remove a timer trigger from a task.
examples: az acr task timer remove -n taskname -r registryname --timer-name t2

commands.name: az acr task timer update
commands.summary: Update the timer trigger for a task.
commands.syntax:
az acr task timer update --name
                         --registry
                         --timer-name
                         [--enabled {false, true}]
                         [--resource-group]
                         [--schedule]
examples: az acr task timer update -n taskname -r registryname --timer-name t2 --schedule "0 12 * * *"
az acr task timer update -n taskname -r registryname --timer-name t2 --enabled False
